name: Starblog
body:
we  start  full cluster , but it's slaves doesn't startup. 
see slave log:

2015-05-25 18:53:35,644 FATAL org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager: Error starting NodeManager
org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnRuntimeException: org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnRuntimeException: Recieved SHUTDOWN signal from Resourcemanager ,Registration of NodeManager failed, Message from ResourceManager: NodeManager from  bjzw1247 doesn't satisfy minimum allocations, Sending SHUTDOWN signal to the NodeManager.
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.serviceStart
(NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.java:197)
        at org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService.start(AbstractService.java:193)
        at org.apache.hadoop.service.CompositeService.serviceStart
(CompositeService.java:120)
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager.serviceStart
(NodeManager.java:264)
        at org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService.start(AbstractService.java:193)
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager.initAndStartNodeManager
(NodeManager.java:463)
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager.main
(NodeManager.java:509)
Caused by: org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnRuntimeException: Recieved SHUTDOWN signal from Resourcemanager ,Registration of NodeManager failed, Message from ResourceManager: NodeManager from  bjzw1247 doesn't satisfy minimum allocations, Sending SHUTDOWN signal to the NodeManager.
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.registerWithRM
(NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.java:265)
        at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.serviceStart
(NodeStatusUpdaterImpl.java:191)
        ... 6 more
2015-05-25 18:53:35,645 INFO org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager: SHUTDOWN_MSG: 
/************************************************************
SHUTDOWN_MSG: Shutting down NodeManager at bjzw_12_47/10.136.12.47
************************************************************/
2015-05-25 20:14:09,498 INFO org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.NodeManager: STARTUP_MSG: 
/************************************************************
STARTUP_MSG: Starting NodeManager

应该是yarn-site.xml中的内存参数设置的问题，好像不能设置1G以下的.
通过注释掉yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb此参数的设置，或者改用较大的内存，将正常启动
